description: nova.volume.api.API._cast_create_volume need reservations parameter when it cast create_volume to volume manager, so VolumeManager.create_volume() can commit the reservations in volume quota.
title: lack reservations parameter when cast create_volume

comments.content: nova.volume.api.API._cast_create_volume need reservations parameter when it cast create_volume to volume manager, so VolumeManager.create_volume() can commit the reservations in volume quota.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zrzhit

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/12854
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/24fa0cc0c644c846baa746cf580cea9fd863a26f

Branch:    master

commit 24fa0cc0c644c846baa746cf580cea9fd863a26f
Author: Rongze Zhu <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 12 07:32:03 2012 +0000

    Add reservations parameter when cast "create_volume" to volume manager
    
    Fixes bug #1050192
    
    Add reservations parameter when _cast_create_volume cast
    "create_volume" to volume manager. So VolumeManager.create_volume() can
    commit the reservations in volume quota.
    
    Change-Id: I8f3104d53bde55d4d83f39253869cc78a8511750
